column4: how can i turn my pc to a ftp server? some friends of mine want to download some datas from my pC?
port forwarding, install webmin and ProFTPd, and it works out of the box for new users
or even set up a ssh account dedicated for sFTP
what if i want to install a ftp server on my computer? something like ftp.myIPaddress:21
do you know about domains etc
